description: Lists the permissions an account has to configure Amazon Inspector.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: A token to use for paginating results that are returned in the response. Set the value of this parameter to null for the first request to a list action. For subsequent calls, use the NextToken value returned from the previous request to continue listing results after the first page.

nested_items.name: permissions
nested_items.description: Contains details on the permissions an account has to configure Amazon Inspector.

nested_items.name: operation
nested_items.description: The operations that can be performed with the given permissions.

nested_items.name: service
nested_items.description: The services that the permissions allow an account to perform the given operations for.
